outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to implement activities of Equity's Observatory, a tool that enables Brazilian society for accessing information on existing actions, projects, policies and available resources focused on overwhelming inequities in Brazil. It is also intended to provide subsidies for reinforcing a national debate on social public policies, as well as a monitoring and evaluation tool. The project will achieve this through the following 4 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) Register situations of inequality, in order to guide actions for the achievement of equity and propose public policies and social actions to overcome the situations observed, (ii) Theoretical foundations, methodological and conceptual of the Equity's Observatory constructed, (iii) Knowledge of development and promotion of equity earnings and (iv) Equity's Observatory institutionally strengthened.
